pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences. 

Avoid describing each frame of the image and use the continuous angles of the video to describe it
pre_caption: The video captures a nighttime drive down a wet, rural road, viewed from inside a vehicle. Headlights and police lights illuminate the dark, rainy scene, with reflections glistening on the pavement and grassy shoulders visible on either side. The atmosphere is tense and moody, enhanced by the limited visibility and the presence of emergency vehicles.
